vocabulary.name: AlternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme
vocabulary.Description: This table defines alternative character sets are used (as specified in the second or later components of MSH-18 character sets), and if any special handling scheme is needed. Table type: HL7

concept.displayName: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2
This standard is titled Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique.
